document_data.name: River of Metals
document_data.mainbody: The '''River of Metals''' was a river found in [[Threskel]], a realm that was once considered part of northern [[Unther]].
document_data.Description: The river was named after its rich deposits of precious metals, especially [[gold]].

Geography.Geographic Features: The lands north of the river were exceptionally well-suited for growing crops.

document_data.History: Throughout recorded history, the river has played host to two separate gold rushes, each of which were halted due to the greed of young [[chromatic dragon]]s that came down from the [[Riders to the Sky]] mountains to claim the riches for their own.
